launcher.startScript: (cd ~/jenkins-utils && git pull git@github.com:sifive/jenkins-utils.git) && \ AGENT_NAME=SLURM.CRITICAL.012 \ JNLP_SECRET=8aee96e57db7b50a60492d1c39aa41e3af7a8debd2c95729b449993c6c9c7881 \ JENKINS_AGENT_SLURM_PARTITION=redhat \ JENKINS_AGENT_SALLOC_ACCOUNT=misc_ci \ JENKINS_URL=https://jenkins.internal.sifive.com/ \ ~/jenkins-utils/tools/jenkins-agent-salloc-small.sh
